name: Four Sides (Tristan Ibanez Games)
description:
Four Sides is a 2D Platformer that mixes super meat boy and mega-man together in a variety of levels.

My first group project in trimester 3. This game was produced for 6 weeks and demonstrates a game that has a variety of self created assets and ideas. Thanks for giving this a look!

Controls:
  • A and D to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • left click to shoot
  • ESC to pause game.
